overview: Two young Mormon Sisters who are secretly in love must say a heart-wrenching goodbye when a sudden transfer threatens to separate them from each other for good. A closeted housewife finds her wedding vows tested when her husband's boss and her wife visit for dinner, as the boss's wife tries to seduce her while her husband is in the other room. A slumber party prank leaves an introverted teen in tears, until one of the partygoers comes to check on her in the bathroom and they share an unexpected tender moment.
tagline: True life, true love, true lust.
title: True Lesbian
